content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of Copper Ore, and my inventory now includes coal, stone, iron ore, copper ore, and iron plates.

# Now, I can smelt the Copper Ore into Copper Plates. 
# I will insert the Copper Ore into the Stone Furnace, along with some coal for fuel.

# First, I need to insert the Copper Ore into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 Copper Ore into the Stone Furnace.

# Now, I will check my inventory to confirm the changes.
print(f"Inventory after inserting Copper Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Inspecting inventory after insertion. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the current entities on the map.
